title: Be Careful What You Wish For
description: Pamela is an eight-year-old girl who loves horror movies and fairy tales. When his uncle gives her away a doll named "Hellequin" as a birthday gift, a tale of betrayal begins to unfold before her eyes.

reviews.text: Não há muito a dizer sobre este filme. "Careful What You Wish For" apresenta-nos uma história não muito original e aborrecida. Nick Jonas, um ótimo cantor e um ótimo ator, não deu o seu melhor neste filme. Perda de tempo.
I just relly appreciate the movie, a little too "obvious" but nice. Nick can do better thing, i love his music but he can act well, but not in all the movies.
There really isn't much to say here, this is about the worst movie that I have ever seen. If someone hadn't paid for my ticket, I would have asked for my money back.
"Careful What You Wish For" é aborrecido e inautêntico. É sempre bom ver Nick Jonas no ecrã de novo, mas, neste filme, ele foi péssimo.3/10
